description: This file is a CMake script that defines functions for generating JSON and documentation from JSON plugin descriptions, and sets up the environment for a JSON generator tool used within a broader build system.

methods.name: JsonGenerator
methods.description: A function that constructs and executes a command line to run an external JSON generator script with specified options and inputs.

methods.name: DocGenerator
methods.description: A function that sets up parameters and calls `JsonGenerator` to generate documentation for a plugin from a JSON description file.
